page.title: 17The Chequers-Rothersthorpe
page.content: This is the only Public House in the village. The landlord and landlady have managed the Chequers for 15 years. They have 3 or 4 part-time staff to help out during the week. Entertainment in the Chequers consists of : Skittles matches both men and women. Ladies matches on a Tuesday night. Men's matches on a Thursday. Darts are played regularly and they often have a Fancy Dress Competition. Bar snacks arve available at all time. When the weather is good customers can sit outside around tables.
